to.shell_command: osascript -e 'on run' -e 'if running of application "System Settings" then -- Close System Settings if its running' -e 'try' -e 'tell application "System Settings" to quit' -e 'on error' -e 'do shell script "killall \"System Preferences\""' -e 'end try' -e 'delay 0.5' -e 'end if' -e 'repeat while running of application "System Settings" is true -- Ensure System Settings is not running' -e 'delay 0.5' -e 'end repeat' -e 'do shell script "open -j x-apple.systempreferences:com.apple.ControlCenter-Settings.extension" -- Open to Control Center settings' -e 'delay 1 -- Allow time for the window to open' -e 'tell application "System Events"' -e 'tell application process "System Settings"' -e 'repeat until exists (pop up button 1 of group 9 of scroll area 1 of group 1 of group 2 of splitter group 1 of group 1 of window "Control Center") -- Wait until the Control Center settings are loaded' -e 'delay 0.2' -e 'end repeat' -e 'tell pop up button 1 of group 9 of scroll area 1 of group 1 of group 2 of splitter group 1 of group 1 of window "Control Center" -- Access the pop-up button' -e 'click' -e 'delay 0.2 -- Allow the menu to appear' -e 'if value is "In Full Screen Only" then -- Determine the current selection and toggle' -e 'click menu item "Always" of menu 1' -e 'else if value is "Always" then' -e 'click menu item "In Full Screen Only" of menu 1' -e 'else' -e 'display alert "Unexpected value detected. Please check the UI structure."' -e 'end if' -e 'end tell' -e 'end tell' -e 'end tell' -e 'delay 1' -e 'tell application "System Settings" to quit' -e 'end run'
